ForceAbility.Name: Move Basic Power
ForceAbility.Description:
The Force user can move small objects via the power of the Force.
The user may spend [LI] to move one object of silhouette 0 that is within short range up to his maximum range. The default maximum range is short range.

Sources.Source: Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook

ForceAbility.Name: Magnitude
ForceAbility.Description: Spend [LI] to increase targets affected equal to Magnitude upgrades purchased.

Sources.Source: Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook

ForceAbility.Name: Strength
ForceAbility.Description: Spend [LI] to increase silhouette able to be targeted equal to Strength upgrades purchased.

Sources.Source: Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook

ForceAbility.Name: Range
ForceAbility.Description: Spend [LI] to increase power's range by a number of range bands equal to Range up- . grades purchased.

Sources.Source: Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook

ForceAbility.Name: Control: Hurl
ForceAbility.Description: The Force user can hurl objects to damage targets, by making a Discipline check combined with a Move power check, dealing damage equal to 10 times silhouette.

Sources.Source: Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook

ForceAbility.Name: Control: Pull
ForceAbility.Description: The Force user can pull objects out of secure mountings or out of an opponent's grasp.

Sources.Source: Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook

ForceAbility.Name: Control: Manipulate
ForceAbility.Description: The character can perform fine manipulation of items, allowing him to do whatever he could normally do with his hands via this power at this power's range.

Sources.Source: Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook

ForceAbility.Name: Foresee Basic Power
ForceAbility.Description: The Force user can feel the Force flowing around everything, seeing what is and what will be. The user may spend [LI] to gain vague hints of events to come, up to a day into his future.

ForceAbility.Name: Control: Initiative (Success)
ForceAbility.Description: When making a skill check to determine initiative, the Force user may roll a Foresee power check as part of the pool. He may spend [LI] to gain [SU] per point on the check.

ForceAbility.Name: Control: Defense
ForceAbility.Description: Affected targets increase their ranged and melee defense by 2 for the first round of combat.

ForceAbility.Name: Control: Initiative (Maneuver)
ForceAbility.Description: When performing a Foresee power check as part of an initiative check, the Force user may spend [LI] to allow all affected targets to take one free maneuver before the first round of combat begins.

ForceAbility.Name: Duration
ForceAbility.Description: Spend [LI] to increase the days into the future the user can see equal to Duration upgrades purchased.

ForceAbility.Name: Range
ForceAbility.Description: Spend [LI] to increase power's range by a number of range bands equal to range upgrades purchased.

ForceAbility.Name: Magnitude
ForceAbility.Description: Spend [LI] to increase targets affected equal to Magnitude upgrades purchased.

ForceAbility.Name: Strength
ForceAbility.Description: Spend [LI] to pick out specific details equal to Strength upgrades purchased.

ForceAbility.Name: Enhance Basic Power
ForceAbility.Description: When making an Athletics check, the Force user may roll an Enhance power check as part of the pool. The user may spend [LI] to gain [SU] or [AD] (user's choice) on the check.

ForceAbility.Name: Range
ForceAbility.Description: Spend [LI] to increase power's range by a number of range bands equal to Range upgrades purchased.

ForceAbility.Name: Control: Coordination
ForceAbility.Description: Enhance can be used with the Coordination skill.

ForceAbility.Name: Control: Resilience
ForceAbility.Description: Enhance can be used with the Resilience skill.

ForceAbility.Name: Control: Force Leap (Horizontal)
ForceAbility.Description: Take a Force Leap action: make a Enhance power check. The user may spend [LI] to jump horizontally to any location in short range.

ForceAbility.Name: Control: Piloting - Planetary
ForceAbility.Description: Enhance can be used with the Piloting (Planetary) skill.

ForceAbility.Name: Control: Brawl
ForceAbility.Description: Enhance can be used with the Brawl skill.

ForceAbility.Name: Control: Force Leap (Vertical)
ForceAbility.Description: When performing a Force Leap, the user can jump vertically in addition to jumping horizontally.

ForceAbility.Name: Control: Piloting - Space
ForceAbility.Description: Enhance can be used wit the Piloting (Space) skill.

ForceAbility.Name: Control: Brawn
ForceAbility.Description: Ongoing effect: Commit [LI] The user increases his Brawn characteristic by 1 (to a maximum of 6).

ForceAbility.Name: Control: Agility
ForceAbility.Description: Ongoing effect: Commit [LI]. The user increases his Agility characteristic by 1 (to a maximum of 6).

ForceAbility.Name: Control: Force Leap (Maneuver)
ForceAbility.Description: The user can perform a Force Leap as a maneuver instead of an action.
